alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Montgomery; Parke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fountain, northeastern Parke and southwestern Montgomery Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Newport, or 21 miles west of Crawfordsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Fountain, northeastern Parke and southwestern Montgomery Counties, including the following locations... Wallace, Turkey Run State Park, Yeddo, Shades State Park, Marshall, Kingman, Alamo, Judson and Waveland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for west central Indiana.
